Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and grease a 9x13 inch baking pan with the melted butter.
Blend eggs, milk, and flour in a blender until smooth, and then pour the mixture into the prepared pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes.

Combine sugar, buttermilk, butter, corn syrup, and baking soda in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Cook for 7 minutes, then remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Drizzle the mixture over the sliced pancake.
